text: Allahako adesa hune chah ki, jinna ra manisaharuko jo samuha timiharubhanda pahile nai gujri sakeka chan. Tinako sathama timi pani narkama ja'u. Jaba kunai samuha tyasama pravesa garnecha aphubhanda pahileko samuhala'i dhikkarane cha. Yahamsam'ma ki jaba sabai tyasama ekatrita bha'isaknechana. Ta hareka pachillo samuhale pahilo samuhako barema bhanne chanh ki, he raba! Yinai manisaharule hamila'i pathabhrasta gareka thi'e tasartha yinala'i narkako sajaya dobbara dinu. Allahale bhanne chah ‘‘ki, hara'ekala'i du'iguna sajaya di'inecha tara timila'i thaha chaina?’’
